title: Plat 2 LFT
body: Hey guys Im a plat 2 player who can play literally any champ any role required but prefer mid or jungle  ive been playing since early season 2 and am just looking for a team of plat+ players who are consistently eager to play and climb the 5's ladder and try get to diamond and beyond  and want to have some fun and laughter on the way

replies.body: Would you be willing to play top lane? Right now we're looking for a top laner who is flexible with other roles. you'd be great!
